name: NightFeed
description:
NightFeed is a rogue-lite survival experience where you must attack and survive until the dawn breaks. Explore and search the large open-world style areas for secrets and hidden artifacts. You can play NightFeed alone or cooperatively with up to three other players (4-player co-op).



Armed and protected with auras of dark magic, a coven of Shadow Hunters perform a nightly feed across the moors, consuming the dead and stealing their treasure and relics from centuries ago.

Ancient relics capable of crafting even stronger protection against the darkness that roams this black world, providing new and stronger experiences for the next NIGHTFEED...

FEATURES

  • Play online co-op or solo
  • Unlock stronger and powerful characters... including WEREWOLF!
  • Multiple open-world style maps to unlock... including Jurassic map with DINOSAURS!
  • Find hidden items and secrets
  • Complete random side-quests for more treasure, artifacts and gold
